Uses of Class
dkeep.logic.Map

    • Uses of Map in dkeep.logic

      Methods in dkeep.logic that return Map 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map Game.getMap()
      Gets the current map state in the current level
      Methods in dkeep.logic with parameters of type Map 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Guard.GuardMove(Map m)
      Moves the guard to it's next position in the path given its type (a rookie's next position index is current+1, a drunken may be asleep and may change movement direction when he wakes up, a suspicious guard may change its direction randomly); the method also updates the guard's position in the map.
      void Hero.HeroMove(Map m, java.lang.String move)
      Sets in motion verifications for the hero's next move, he can only move into an empty space, a lever/key and an open door
      void Ogre.OgreErase(Map m)
      Clears the ogre's and its bat's cells in the map
      void Ogre.OgreMove(Map m)
      Sets in motion the ogre and its bat's movement, randomly selecting a direction until it is valid
      Constructors in dkeep.logic with parameters of type Map 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(Map m2, Hero h2, Guard g2)
      Constructor used to create a new dungeon type game, only for saving purposes.
      Game(Map m2, Hero h2, Ogre[] o2)
      Constructor used to create a new keep type game, only for saving and testing an edited level.
